mapper.select: SELECT n.*, name FROM users u JOIN notice n ON u.id = n.id WHERE nno=#{nno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice VALUES (SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, #{id})
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title=#{title},content=#{content} WHERE nno=#{nno}
update notice set ncount = ncount + 1 where nno=#{nno}
